mapper.sql: id, customer_id,description, money, num, file_id, data_flag, `state`, remark, create_time, update_time
mapper.delete: update desposit set data_flag = -1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into desposit (id,customer_id,description, money, num, file_id, `state`, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update desposit set money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, description = #{description,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
